application.doc: Update the tracing configuration file for the policy server

method.name: PUT
method.id: Update tracing configuration file - Runtime Components
method.doc: This web service will update the contents of the tracing configuration file for a local policy server using the supplied parameters.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: contents
param.doc: The new contents of the tracing configuration file.
